thread.title: Lobster-inspired £3.8m super lightweight mirror chosen for Chinese-French space mission (University of Leicester)

author: wn.com
title: Lobster-inspired £3.8m super lightweight mirror chosen for Chinese-French space mission (University of Leicester)
text: ( Source : University of Leicester ) University of Leicester announces major new space contract to develop innovative optic to locate gamma-ray bursts signifying the deaths of massive stars Issued by University of Leicester Press Office on 26
